SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.model.flight

Class FlightModel

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.model.flight.FlightModel
public class FlightModel extends Object
Flight Model class representing a flight in the Airport Gate Management System. This class stores all information related to a flight including: - Basic flight details (number, airline, origin, destination) - Scheduling information (departure and arrival times) - Gate assignments - Current status and location - Operational data (passenger count, remarks) The class also includes validation annotations to ensure data integrity when flights are created or updated through forms. It provides helper methods to calculate derived flight information such as duration and delay status. This model is central to the gate assignment functionality, as gates are assigned to specific flights during specific time periods.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlightModel

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Determines if a flight is currently active (in progress). A flight is considered active if it is: - Boarding - Has departed - Is en route - Is approaching its destination This helps with filtering flights that require active monitoring.
      Returns:
      true if the flight is currently active, false otherwise

    • isDelayed

      public boolean isDelayed()
      Determines if a flight is delayed based on its status or actual times. A flight is considered delayed if: - Its status is explicitly set to DELAYED - Its actual departure time is later than scheduled departure time - Its actual arrival time is later than scheduled arrival time
      Returns:
      true if the flight is delayed, false otherwise

    • getFlightIdentifier

      public String getFlightIdentifier()
      Gets the full flight identifier by combining airline code and flight number. For example, if airlineCode is "UA" and flightNumber is "123", this method returns "UA123".
      Returns:
      The complete flight identifier (airline code + flight number)

    • getScheduledDuration

      public long getScheduledDuration()
      Calculates the scheduled duration of the flight in minutes. This is determined from the difference between scheduled arrival and scheduled departure times.
      Returns:
      The flight duration in minutes, or 0 if scheduling information is incomplete
